dct_description_sm: "Lith. by G. Hayward, 171 Pearl St. N.Y., for D.T. Valentine's Manual, 1863." Covers all of Manhattan Island, New York (N.Y.) Shows vegetation, a few buildings and placenames.Shows property and lots. Date of situation 1664-1668--cf. Cohen, Paul E. and Robert T. Augustyn. Manhattan in Maps. NY: Rizzoli, 1997, p. 44. Date of this ms. copy 1862 Mar. Title as commonly used--cf. Cohen, ibid. Oriented with north to right. Includes note on distances. Inset: The towne of New-York (scale [ca. 1:2376]).
dct_publisher_sm: [New York : Common Council, 1863] (N[ew] Y[ork] : G. Hayward)
dct_subject_sm: Manhattan (New York, N.Y.)—Maps, Manuscript—Early works to 1800—Facsimiles
dcat_theme_sm: Manhattan (New York, N.Y.)—Maps, Manuscript—Early works to 1800—Facsimiles
